name: Broken Control
description:
Description:

Get the faulty prototype through the obstacle course.

It's controls aren't responding properly.

(This game can be played with 2 players)

Optional Rule:

Players can switch controls after each death.

Controls:

(Player 1)

A - move left

D - move right

(Player 2)

Up arrow - jump

Down arrow - (use while in the air to drop to the ground)
